MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL63 postcode area of Ty Croes, affecting properties in Rhosmor and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to a secondary fault found we now expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on 21st October 2020
